basic_info.description: I am Carl Sanders, currently a student software developer at CodeCrew Collective. I was a former Airforce Veteran for 4 years stationed at Whiteman AFB. I'm currently learning the skills of computer science & software development to further my knowledge about computer programming. I am highly passionate about learning computer programming to redirect my career preference. Knowing that computers are the present and the future, I'm here to make a life changing future for myself. As well as, work to make a difference for you!

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: This project was a demonstration of an cookie stand shop for selling salmon cookies.

projects.title: HornedBeast
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for creating an application that optimizes images with popular algorithms.
